turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, am in desperate need of a cup of coffee. So, I was hoping you could help me buy one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i need coffee as well, i can help you with that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool. Yeah. So, I want to make an order at Starbucks for for an iced Starbucks Blonde vanilla-bean coconut milk latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbuck got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me repeat that for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ice starbucks blonde vanilla bean coconut latte is that right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, and I want it with whole milk, and also can I get it topped with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: whole milk and topped with whipped cream, sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, and I want a it should be venti size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: was just about to ask you the size, venti, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, cool.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm in Palo Alto and so I was hoping I can pick it up on the one on El Camino Real.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where are you close to? so i can find a store for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: found it, ok will order from the starbucks on el camino real in palo alto california.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right on.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm your entire order before we make the purchase?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats with starbucks ice starbucks a venti blonde vanilla bean coconut latte with whole milk and topped with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, drink has been ordered at the local store and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I just want to make sure you said venti, right? It's a venti It's a venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's a Venti iced Blonde vanilla bean coconut milk latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, Venti ice blonde vanilla bean coconut latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. No, you got me all set.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
